net.threescale.api

Class ApiFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.threescale.api.ApiFactory

  • public class ApiFactory
extends Object
    Factory class to create 3scale Api objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_3SCALE_PROVIDER_API_URL
      Default URL of 3Scale Provider

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApiFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Api2 createV2Api(String provider_private_key)
      Creates a new Version 2 Api object using DEFAULT_3SCALE_PROVIDER_API_URL
      static Api2 createV2Api(String url, String provider_private_key)
      Creates a new Version 2 Api object.
      static Api2 createV2Api(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender)
      Creates a new Server Api object, with out any caching.
      static Api2 createV2ApiWithCache(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender, ApiCache cache)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object with a user specified cache and http sender.
      static Api2 createV2ApiWithLocalCache(String url, String provider_private_key)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object using the default local cache parameters in etc/default.xml and default http sender.
      static Api2 createV2ApiWithLocalCache(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object using the default local cache parameters in etc/default.xml and a user specified http sender (mainly for testing).
      static Api2 createV2ApiWithRemoteCache(String url, String provider_private_key, String path_to_config)
      Creates a Cached Server Api object with cache paramter file specificed by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • createV2Api

        public static Api2 createV2Api(String url,
               String provider_private_key)
        Creates a new Version 2 Api object.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://su1.3scale.net.
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        Returns:
        A new Api object.

      • createV2Api

        public static Api2 createV2Api(String provider_private_key)
        Creates a new Version 2 Api object using DEFAULT_3SCALE_PROVIDER_API_URL
        Parameters:
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        Returns:
        A new Api object.

      • createV2Api

        public static Api2 createV2Api(String url,
               String provider_private_key,
               HttpSender sender)
        Creates a new Server Api object, with out any caching.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://server.3scale.net.
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        sender - The HttpSender object to be used for communication with the server.
        Returns:
        A new Server Api object.

      • createV2ApiWithCache

        public static Api2 createV2ApiWithCache(String url,
                        String provider_private_key,
                        HttpSender sender,
                        ApiCache cache)
        Creates a new Cached Server Api object with a user specified cache and http sender.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://server.3scale.net.
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        sender - The HttpSender object to be used for communication with the server.
        cache - The cache to use.
        Returns:
        A new Server Api object.

      • createV2ApiWithLocalCache

        public static Api2 createV2ApiWithLocalCache(String url,
                             String provider_private_key,
                             HttpSender sender)
        Creates a new Cached Server Api object using the default local cache parameters in etc/default.xml and a user specified http sender (mainly for testing).
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://server.3scale.net.
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        sender - The HttpSender object to be used for communication with the server.
        Returns:
        A new Server Api object.

      • createV2ApiWithLocalCache

        public static Api2 createV2ApiWithLocalCache(String url,
                             String provider_private_key)
        Creates a new Cached Server Api object using the default local cache parameters in etc/default.xml and default http sender.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://server.3scale.net.
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        Returns:
        A new Server Api object.

      • createV2ApiWithRemoteCache

        public static Api2 createV2ApiWithRemoteCache(String url,
                              String provider_private_key,
                              String path_to_config)
        Creates a Cached Server Api object with cache paramter file specificed by the user.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the server to connect to. e.g. http://server.3scale.net.
        provider_private_key - The Providers private key obtained from 3scale.
        path_to_config - Path to the cache config xml file.
        Returns:
        A new Server Api object.
